Methods:: *Filtering by `hmmsearch --cut_tc` and obvious outgroups in a draft phylogenetic tree
**Look if a high portion of bifurcations have a low bootstrap support (<50)
***Run all sequences from either FunGene or NCBI clustered at 99% identity against the reference package using treesapp evaluate
****Use treesapp purity to determine whether the reference package recruits unwanted domains or genes
